page.title: 18PRIORY BAPTIST CHURCH, 2.
page.content: These groups are a pre-school playgroup, a mother and toddler group, the Priory Pilots (for boys aged 7-16), a prayer and bible study group,a women's meeting and a Girl's Brigade. Next to the church is{Williamson {House.}This was built by the{Baptist {Housing Association}in 1980. It comprises four double and four single flats for old people. The church looks after the day to day running of the house, pastoral care and rent collection, etc. The house is named after Mr. and Mrs. Williamson who were involved in the building and running of the original Priory Baptist Church in the 1940's and 1950's.
